text: Michel Larocque (born October 3, 1976) is a German former professional ice hockey goaltender who played three games in the National Hockey League (NHL) with the Chicago Blackhawks. ==Awards and honours== {| class="wikitable" ! Award ! title: Michel Larocque (ice hockey, born 1976)
